title: Analog Clock AW Plus-7
summary: Original white analog watch face for Android Wear.
description: Original white analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date. Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 3 colors);* Right bottom color: to set gray color to display date and digital clock.
descriptionHTML:
Original white analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date.
Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.
To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.
* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;
* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 3 colors);
* Right bottom color: to set gray color to display date and digital clock.
comments: Position center only. Little above from center will be beauty.
Big Clock It is eazy to see!
